moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Marth, prince of Altea, escapes when his kingdom is invaded.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Two years later, Marth sets out to recruit allies and reclaim Altea.

moments.name: important meeting
moments.description: Marth arrives in Aurelis and forms an alliance with Hardin.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Princess Nyna gives Marth the Fire Emblem, a treasure for the champion who will save the world.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Marth storms Altea castle, but discovers that his mother is dead and his sister has been captured by Gharnef.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Marth successfully assembles Starlight, the weapon needed to defeat Gharnef.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Marth defeats Gharnef and finally reunites with his sister, Elice.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Marth is advised by Nyna to seek out happiness and confesses his love to Caeda.
